juzs.text: te'o kaya visaya babata puchatacha kari rahya che
te moti sucana babata vise
jena vise te'o matabheda kari rahya che
cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
phari cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
sum ame dharatine patharanum nathi banavyum
ane parvatone khunta (nathi banavya)
ane ame tamane jodakamam peda karya
ane ame tamari nidrane tamara arama mate ja banavi
ane ratane ame parado banavyo che
ane divasane kamani mate banavyo
ane ame tamara upara sata majabuta akasa banavya
ane eka camakato divo (surya) banavyo
ane vadalomam thi musaladhara varasada varasavyo
jethi tenathi anaja ane vanaspati upajave
ane harya-bharya baga. (Pana upajave)
ni:Sanka phesalano divasa nisrcita che
je divase suramam phukavamam avase, pachi tame jutha na jutha cali avaso
ane akasa kholi nakhavamam avase. Temam dvara ja dvara tha'i jase
ane parvatane calavavamam avase, to te maricika banine rahi jase
ni:Sanka dojhakha ghatamam che
duracari'o num thekanu te ja che
jemam te'o aganita varso sudhi padya rahese
na temam thandi tatha pinum cakhase
sivaya garama pani ane (vahetu) paru
(Temane) sampurna badalo malase
ni:Sanka te'o hisabani asa ja nahata rakhata
ane bebakithi amari ayatone juthalavata hata
ane ame dareka vastune gani ganine lakhi rakhi che
have, tame (potani karanini) maja cakho
ni:Sanka darava vala'o mate ja saphalata che
bagica'o ane draksa che
ane navayuvana kumarika'o
ane chalakata pyala
tyam na bakavasa sambhalase ane na to juthi vato sambhalase
(temane) tamara palanahara taraphathi (temana sara karyo no)a badalo malase. Je bharapura hase

(te palanahara taraphathi malase je) akaso ane jaminano ane je kami pana temani vacce che teno palanahara che, ane te khubaja mapha karavavalo che, ko'ine pana tenathi vatacita karavano adhikara nahi hoya
je divase ruha ane pharista'o katarabandha ubha hase, ko'i vata nahi kari sake sivaya te, jene atyanta dayalu paravanagi ape, ane te yogya vata kahese
te divasa nisrcita che. Have je icche te potana palanahara pase (sara karyo) kari thekanu banavi le
ni:Sanka ame tamane najikamam ja avanari yatanathi daravi didha (ane cokanna kari didha) che. Je divase manavi tena hatho'e karela (karma) jo'i lese, ane kaphira kahese ke kadaca hum mati tha'i jata
dubine sakhtithi khencavavala'o na soganda
bandha kholine chodavi denara'o na soganda
ane tarava-pharanara'o na soganda
pachi dodine agala vadhanara'o na soganda
pachi karyani vyavastha karanara'o na soganda
je divasa dhrujavavali dhrujase
tyarapachi eka pachala avavavali (pachala-pachala) avase
(ketalaka) hrdaya te divase dhadaki rahya hase
temani ankho jhukeli hase
kahe che ke sum ame phari pahelani sthitimam lavavamam avisum
Sum te vakhate jyare ke ame ogali gayela hadaka tha'i ja'isum
kahe che, pachi to a pachu pharavu nukasanakaraka che
(khabara hovi jo'i'e) basa a eka (daravani) jhatakani che
pachi (jena prakata thavani sathe ja) te'o tarata ja medanamam bhega tha'i jase
sum musa (a.Sa.) Ni vata tamane nathi pahonci
jyare pavitra ghati â€œtuvaâ€ mam tene tena palanahare pokaryo
(ke) tame phira'auna pase ja'o, ni:Sanka te vidrohi bani gayo che
ane tene kaho, sum tum pavitra thava mage che
ane hum tara palanahara tarapha margadarsana karum jethi tu (tenathi) darava lage
pachi tene moti nisani batavi
to tene juthalavyum ane avaganana kari
pachi pitha batavine dodava lagyo
pachi saune bhega kari pokarya
tamara sauno palanahara hum ja chum
to (sauthi unco) allaha'e pana tene paraloka ane sansarani yatanamam gheri lidho
hakikatamam amam te'o mate siksa che je'o dare che
sum tamaru sarjana vadhu kathina che ke akasa num? Allaha'e tenum sarjana karyu
teni chata unci uthavi ane tene santulana apyum
ane teni rata andhari banavi ane divasane prakasita karyo
ane tyarapachi dharatine (samatola) pathari didhi
tenathi pani ane ghasa-caro upajavyo
ane parvatone (sakhata) khodi didha
a badhu tamara ane tamara pasu'ona labha mate (che)
to jyare moti aphata (pralaya) avase
te divasa manavi potana karmone yada karase
ane (dareka) jovavala same jahannama dekhiti kari devamam avase
to je (manavi'e) avajna kari (hase)
ane dun'yavi jivanane prathamikata api (hase)
(tenum) thekanum jahannama ja che
Ha! Je vyakti potana palanahara same ubho rahevathi darato rahyo hase, ane potana manane manamani karavathi roki rakhyum hase
to cokkasa pane tenum thekanum jannata ja che
loko tamarathi kayamata avavano samaya puche che
tamane teni carca karavani si jarura
tenum jnana to allaha pase ja che
tame to phakata tenathi daravavala'o ne saceta karanara cho
je divasa te'o tene jo'i lese to evum lagase ke phakata divasani eka sanja athava teni pahora (duniyamam) rokaya che
tene bhava cadhavya, ane mom pheravi lidhum
(etala mate) ke teni pase eka andha avi gayo
tamane sum khabara kadaca te pavitrata prapta karato
athava sikhamana sambhalato ane tene sikhamana labha pahoncadati
je laparavahi kare che
teni tarapha to tame puratu dhyana api rahya cho
jo ke temana na sudharava thi tamara para ko'i dosa nathi
ane je vyakti tamari pase dodato ave che
ane te dari (pana) rahyo che
tame teni tarapha bedhyana cho
kadapi nahim, a kura'ana to eka upadesa che
je cahe tenathi sikha melave
(a to) pratisthita sastro mam (che)
je ucca kaksani ane pavitra che
eva lakhanarana hathamam che
je'o adaraniya ane pramanika che
allahani phitakara manavi para, te kevo apakari che
tenum allaha'e ka'i vastuthi sarjana karyu
tene eka tipa vade, pachi anumana para rakhyo tene
pachi tena mate marga sarala karyo
pachi tene mrtyu apyum, ane pachi kabaramam daphanavyo
pachi jyare icchase tene jivita kari dese
ko'i sanka nathi. Tene atyara sudhi allahana adesanum ajnapalananathi karyu
manavi potana bhojana tarapha dhyana dhare
Ni:Sanka ame ja musaladhara pani varasavyum
pachi ame ja dharatine ciri phadi
pachi ame ja temam anaja ugavyum
ane draksa ane sakabhaji'o
ane jaituna ane khajuro
ane harya-bharya bagica'o
ane phalo temaja (ghasa) caro (pana) ugavyo
tamara ane tamara pasu'o na phayada mate
basa! Jyare kana bahera kari nakhanari (kayamata) avi jase
te divase manavi potana sagabha'i thi
ane potani mata temaja pitathi
ane potani patni temaja putrothi bhagase
pratyeka vyaktine te divase potani ja padi hase
te divase ketalaya cahera camakata hase
(je) hasata temaja praphullita hase
ane ketalaya cahera'o para te divase dhula lageli hase
temana para kalasa chavayeli hase
te'o ja juthalavanara ane duracari hase
jyare suraja lapeti devamam avase
ane jyare tara'o prakasahina tha'i jase
ane jyare parvato calavavamam avase
ane jyare dasa mahinani garbhavali untanine chodi devamam avase
ane jyare jangali janavara bhega karavamam avase
ane jyare dariya'o bhadakavavamam avase
ane jyare atma'o (sariro sathe) jodi devamam avase
ane jyare jivati dateli balakine savala karavamam avase
ke kaya aparadhana karane mari nakhavamam avi
ane jyare karmanondha kholi nakhavamam avase
ane jyare akasani khala khenci levamam avase
ane jyare jahannama bhadakavavamam avase
ane jyare jannata najika lavavamam avase
pratyeka vyakti jani lese je te la'ine avyo che
hum sogandha kha'u chum pachala hatavavala
calanara ane santa'i janara tara'o ni
ane ratani jyare samapta thava lage che
Ane savarani jyare camakava lage
ni:Sanka a eka ijhajhatavala pharista'o ni laveli vani che
je saktisali che. Arsavala (allaha) ne tyam ucca sthanavalo che
jeni vata manavamam ave che. Pramanika che
ane tamara sathi pagala nathi
tene tene (jibra'ila) akasona khulla kinare joya pana che
ane te chupi vato batavavamam kanjusa pana nathi
ane a kura'ana dhikkarela sayatananum kathana nathi
pachi tame kyam ja'i rahya cho
a jagata vasi'o mate eka smrtibodha che
(khasa karine) temana mate je sidho marga apanavava mage che
ane tame nathi icchi sakata jyam sudhi samraga srstino palanahara nathi icchato
jyare akasa phati padase
ane jyare tara'o vikhara'i jase
ane jyare dariya'o vahi padase
ane jyare kabaro (phadine) ukhadi nakhavamam avase
(tyare) pratyeka vyakti potana agala mokalela ane pachala chodela (etale ke agala-pachala na karmo) ne jani lese
he manava! Tane tara krpalu palanaharani babatamam ka'i vastu'e bharamavi didho che
je (palanahare) tarum sarjana karyum, pachi thika thaka karyo, pachi (santulitakaryo'ane) barabara banavyo
je svarupamam cahyum tane jodi didho
kadapi nahi! Parantu tame to badalana divasane juthalavo cho
ni:Sanka tamara para niriksaka, pratisthita
lakhavavala niyukata karavamam avela che
je tame kari rahya cho te'o jane che
nisrcitapane sadacari loko (jannatana esa-arama ane) anandamam hase
ane nisrcitapane duracari loko jahannamamam hase
badalana divase temam nakhi devamam avase
ane te'o tenathi ardasya nahim tha'i sake
ane tane sum khabara badalano divasa sum che
Pharivara (kahum chum) tane sum khabara badalano divasa sum che
(a che) je divase ko'i ne ko'ina mate kami adhikara nahim hoya, te divase (dareka) adhikara allaha ne ja hase
vinasa che mapatolamam ghatado karanara'o mate
jyare loko pasethi mapi-toli ne le che to purepuru le che
ane jyare temane mapine ke toline ape che to ochu ape che
sum temane potana marya pachi jivita thavano vicara nathi
te mota divasa mate
je divase dareka loko jagatana palanaharani same ubha hase
ni:Sanka duracari'ona karmapatra sijjinamam che
tane sum khabara ke sijjina sum che
(a to) lekhita pustaka che
te divase juthalavanara mate vinasa che
je'o badalana divasane juthalave che
tene phakata te'o ja juthalave che je'o sima'o num ullanghana karanara (ane) gunehagara che
jyare teni same amari ayato padhavamam ave che, to kahi de che ke a to purvajoni kalpanika varta'o che
kadapi nahi, parantu temana hrdayo para temana karmona karane kata (cadhi gayo) che
kadapi nahi, a lokone te divase potana palanaharathi cheta rakhavamam avase
phari te loko cokkasapane jahannamamam jhonkavamam avase
pachi kahim devamam avase ke a ja che jene tame juthalavata rahya
ni:Sanka sadacari'ona karmapatra illiyyinamam che
tane sum khabara ke illiyyina sum che
(te to) lekhita pustaka che
nikata (pharista'o) teni dekharekha kari rahya che
ni:Sanka sadacari'o (khuba ja) inamoni vacce hase
ucca asano para besi nihali rahya hase
tame temana mukho parathi ja inamoni prasannata ne olakhi leso
a lokone silabandha uttama saraba pivadavavamam avase
Jena para kasturinum sila hase. Agala vadhanara'o e temam ja agala vadhavum jo'i'e
ane teni milavata tasnimani hase
(etale ke) te jharanum jenum pani najikana'o pise
aparadhi'o imana valo'o ni majaka udavata hata
ane teni pasethi pasara thata eka-bijane ankhona isara karata hata
ane jyare potana loko tarapha pacha pharata to hasi majaka karata hata
ane jyare temane jota to kaheta ni:Sanka a loko bhatakela (rasto bhulela) che
te'o temana para niriksaka banavine to nathi mokalavamam avya
basa! Aje imanavala'o te inkari'o ni hansi udavase
ucca asana para besi jo'i rahya hase
ke have te inkari'o e jevum te'o karata hata purepuro badalo melavi lidho
jyare akasa phati jase
ane potana palanaharana adesa para kana dharase. Ane tena ja layaka te che
ane jyare jamina (khencine) phelavi devamam avase
ane temam je kami pana che tene te bahara phenki dese ane khali tha'i jase
ane potana palanaharana adesa para kana dharase ane tena jalayaka te che
he manavi! Tum potana palanaharane malava sudhi a kosisa ane dareka karya ane mahenata kari tenathi mulakata karavavalo che
to (te vakhate) je vyaktina jamana hathamam karmanondha apavamam avase
teno hisaba to khuba ja halavo levamam avase
ane te potana svajano tarapha khusi khusi pacho pharase
ha! Je vyaktini karmanondha teni pitha pachalathi apavamam avase
to te mrtyune pokarase
ane bhadake balati jahannamamam dakhala thase
a vyakti potana svajano sathe (duniyamam) khusa hato
te samajato hato ke allahani tarapha pacha pharavanum ja nathi
kema nahi, ni:Sanka teno palanahara tene sari rite jo'i rahyo hato
Hum songada kha'u chu saphaka (sandhyani lalasa) na
ane ratrina ane teni sameti lidheli vastu'o na songada
ane candra na jyare te sampurna tha'i jaya che
ni:Sanka tame eka sthitithi biji sthiti para pahoncaso
temane sum tha'i gayum che ke imana nathi lavata
ane jyare temani pase kura'ana padhavamam ave che to sajado nathi karata
parantu je loko'e inkara karyo te juthalavi rahya che
ane allaha ta'ala khuba ja jane che, je kami te'o hrdayo mam rakhe che
te'one du:Khadayaka yatanani subhasucana sambhalavi do
ha, imanavala'o ane sadakaryo karavavala'o ne aganita ane ananta badalo che
burujovala akasana soganda
vacanabadha karayela divasana soganda
hajara thavavala ane hajara karelana soganda
(ke) khadavala nasa karavamam avya
te eka aga hati indhanavali
jyare ke te loko teni ajubaju betha hata
ane musalamano sathe je kari rahya hata tene potani same jo'i rahya hata
ane te imanavala'o thi temani dusmanavata te sivaya ko'i karane na hati ke te'o te allaha upara imana lavya hata je prabhutvasali ane dareka prasansane layaka che
jena mate akasa ane jamina ni badasahata che ane allaha ta'alani same ja che dareka vastu
ni:Sanka je loko'e musalamana puruso ane stri'o upara atyacara karyo pachi tauba (pana) na kari to temana mate jahannamani yatana che ane balavani yatana che
ni:Sanka imana lavanara ane satkarmo karanara'o mate teva bagica'o che jena taliye nahero vahi rahi che. A ja bhavya saphalata che
ni:Sanka tara palanaharani pakada khuba ja sakhata che
te ja paheli vara sarjana kare che ane te ja pharivara sarjana karase
te moto ksama karanara ane khuba ja mohabbata karanara che
Arsano malika ucca pratistha valo che
je icche tene kari nakhanara che
sum tamane sena'o ni sucana pahonci che
(etale ke) phira'auna ane samuda ni
(kami nahi) parantu inkari'o juthalavavamam lagela che
ane allaha ta'ala'e pana te'one dareka bajuthi gheri rakhya che
parantu a kura'ana che. Ucca darajjavalu
lauhe mahaphujha mam (lakhelum)
soganda che akasana ane ratamam pragata thanarana
tamane khabara pana che ke te ratamam pragata thanara sum che
te camakato taro che
ko'i (jiva) evo nathi jena upara dekharekha rakhanara (pharista) na hoya
manavi'e jovum jo'i'e ke te ka'i vastuthi peda karavamam avyo che
te eka uchalata panithi peda karavamam avyo che
je pitha ane chati vaccethi nikale che
cokkasapane te (allaha) tene pharivara lavava para saktimana che
je divase gupta rahasyoni tapasa thase
to nahim hoya teni pase kami sakti, na sahayaka
varasadavala akasana soganda
ane phatavavali jaminana soganda
vastavamam a (kura'ana) sampurna phesalo karavavalo kalama che
a thaththa-majaka (phayada vagarani) vata nathi
kharekhara inkari'o yukti kari rahya che
ane hum pana eka yukti kari rahyo chum
tu inkari'one samaya apa, temane thodaka divasa chodi de
potana sarvocca palanaharana namani pavitrata bayana kara
jene sarjana karyu ane thika-thaka karyo
ane jene (thika-thaka) bhagya banavyum ane pachi marga batavyo
ane jene taji vanaspati'o upajavi
pachi tene tene (sukavine) kalo kacaro banavi didho
ame tamane padhavisu pachi tame nahim bhulo
sivaya je kami allaha icche, te jahera ane chupi (vatone pana) jane che
Ame tamara mate saralata peda kari da'isum
to tame sikhamana apata raho, jo sikhamana labhadayaka hoya
daravavalo to sikhamana grahana karase
(ha) durbhagi tenathi dura rahese
je moti agamam jase
tyam na to te mrtyu pamase na to jivase. (Jana-kanini avasthamam hase)
kharekhara tene saphalata prapta kari je pavitra tha'i gayo
ane jene potana palanaharana namanum smarana karyu, ane namajha padhato rahyo
parantu tame to duniyavi jivanane prathamikata apo cho
ane akhirata sarvottama ane avinasi che
a vato prathama granthomam pana che
(etale ke) ibrahima ane musana granthomam
sum tamane pana dhanki denari (kayamata) ni vata pahonci che
te divase ketalaya cahera apamanita hase
(ane) parisrama karanara thakela hase
te'o dhagadhagati agamam jase
atisaya ukalata jharananum pani te'one pivadavavamam avase
temana mate kantavala suka ghasa sivaya kami khannu nahim hoya
je na hrstaprsta karase ane na bhukha dura karase
ketalaya cahera te divase tajagibharya ane (khusahala) hase
potana prayatnothi khusa hase
uccasreni ni jannatamam hase
temam ko'i bakavasa nahi sambhale
temam eka vahetu jharanum hase
(ane) temam unca-unca asana hase
temam pyala mukela (hase)
ane eka kataramam lagela takiya hase
ane makhamali jajamo phelayeli hase
sum te'o untone nathi jo'i rahya ke te ka'i rite peda karavamam avya che
ane akasane ke ka'i rite uncu karavamam avyum che
ane parvato tarapha te ka'i rite khodi devamam avya che
ane dharati tarapha ke ka'i rite patharavamam avi che
Basa tame sikhamana apata raho. (Karanake) tame phakata sikhamana apanara cho
tame temana upara rakhevala nathi
ha! Je vyakti modhum pheravase ane inkara karase
tene allaha ta'ala bhare saja apase
cokkasapane amara tarapha ja temane pacha pharavanum che
pachi cokkasapane amara sire che, temano hisaba levo
soganda che vaheli parodhana
ane dasa ratri'ona
ane yugma ane visamana
ane ratrina, jyare java lage
sum amam budhdhisali mate ko'i soganda che
sum tame na joyum ke tamara palanahare adi'o sathe kevo vartava karyo
stambhovala iramani sathe
jemana jevi (ko'i koma) duniyamam peda karavamam nathi avi
ane samudavala sathe je'o'e khinamam mota-mota pat'tharo kotarya
ane phira'auna sathe je khuntavalo hato
a badha'e saheromam mathum uncakyum hatum
ane atisaya phasada phelavyo hato
chevate tara palanahare temana para yatanano korado varasavi didho
hakikatamam taro palanahara takamam che
manusya (a sthiti che ke) teno palanahara jyare teni pariksa le che ane ijhajhata ape che, ane tene khusahali ape che, to te kaheva lage che, mara palanahare maru sanmana karyum
ane jyare te teni pariksa le che ane teni roji tanga kari de che, to te kaheva lage che ke mara palanahare marum apamana karyum
avum kadapi nahim! Parantu (vata evi che) ke tame (ja) loko anathano adara nathi karata
ane garibone khavadavava mate eka-bijane ubharata nathi
ane varasani sampatti sametine hadapa kari ja'o cho
ane dhanathi khuba prema karo cho
kadapi nahim, jyare dharati kuti-kutine barabara kari devamam avase
Ane tamaro palanahara (pote) avi jase ane pharista'o katarabandha avase
ane je divase jahannama pana lavavamam avase
e kahese ke kadaca! Mem potana a jivana mate pahela kami mokalyum hota
basa aje allahana ajhaba jevo ajhaba ko'ino nahim hoya
na tena jevi jakada ko'ini jakada hase
o santosi jiva
tum potana palanahara tarapha cala, evi rite ke tum tenathi prasanna, te tara thi prasanna
basa mara srestha banda'o mam dakhala tha'i ja
ane pravesi ja mari jannatamam
hum a saherana soganda kha'um chum
ane tame a saheramam raho cho
ane (soganda che) manavi'o na pita ane santanana
ni:Sanka ame manavinum (khuba ja) kastamam sarjana karyu che
sum te ema dhare che ke tena para ko'i kabu nahim pame
kaheto (phare) che ke mem to puskala dhana vedaphi nakhyum
sum (ema) samaje che ke ko'i'e tene joyo (pana) nathi
sum ame teni banne ankho nathi banavi
ane jibha ane hotha (nathi banavya)
ame dekhadi didha tene banne marga
parantu tenathi ghatimam pasara thavanum na tha'i sakayum
ane sum khabara padi ke ghati sum che
ko'i gala (bandi- bandi'o) ne mukta karavavum
athava to bhukhamara na divase bhojana karavavum
ko'i sambadhi'o mam na anatha ne
athava to rajhalata gariba ne
phari te loko manthi tha'i jato je'o imana lavya ane eka-bija ne dhiraja ane daya dakhavavani bhalamana kare che
a ja loko che jamani baju vala (khusahala loko)
ane je loko'e amari ayatono inkara karyo te du:Khi loko che
te ja loko para aga hase. Careva bajuthi ghereli hase
soganda che suryana tatha tena tadakana
soganda che cadrana jyare teni pachala ave
Soganda che divasana jyare suryane pragata kare
soganda che ratrina jyare tene dhaki dem
soganda che akasana ane tena sarjanana
soganda che dharatina ane tene barabara karavana
soganda che atmana ane tene thika-thaka karavana
phari samaja api tene bura'ini ane bhala'ini
jene tene pavitra kari te saphala thayo
ane jene tene melu karyu te nisphala thayo
(koma) samude potana vidrohana karane juthalavyum
jyare temana mam no moto durbhagi ubho thayo
temane allaha na payagambare kahi didhu hatum ke allaha ta'alani untani'ane teni pivanivari ni (suraksa karo)

te loko'e potana payagambara ne jutho samaji te untani na hatha-paga kapi nakhya. Basa! Temana palanahare temana gunahona karane temana upara prakopa utaryo. Ane pachi prakopane samana kari didho. Ane te abadine sapata kari didhi
te nathi darato tena vinasi parinamathi
soganda che ratrina jyare chava'i jaya
soganda che divasa na jyare prakasita thaya
soganda che te hastina jene nara ane madanum sarjana karyu
ni:Sanka tamaro prayasa vividha prakarano che
jene apyum (allahana rastamam) ane daryo (potana palanahara thi)
ane sadavatoni prsthi karato rahase
to ame pana tene sarala rastani sahulata kari da'isum
parantu jene kanjusi kari ane beparavahi dakhavi
ane sadavatone juthalavi
to ame pana teni tangi ane muskelino samana sarala kari da'isum
tenum dhana tene (undha) padati vakhate kasum kama nahim lage
ni:Sanka rasto batavavo amara sire che
ane amara ja hathamam che akhirata ane duniya
mem to tamane bhadake balati agathi saceta kari didha che
Jemam phakata te ja vidrohi dakhala thase
jene juthalavyum ane (tena anusaranathi) modhum pheravi lidhum
ane tenathi evo vyakti dura rakhavamam avase je khuba ja sanyami hase
je pavitra thava mate potanum dhana ape che
ko'ino tena para ko'i upakara nathi ke jeno badalo apavamam avato hoya
parantu phakata potana palanahara ijhajhatavala tatha sarvocca ni prasannata prapta karava mate
ni:Sanka te (allaha pana) najikamam raji tha'i jase
soganda che prakasita samayanam
ane soganda che ratrina jyare chava'i jaya
na to tara palanahare tane chodayo che, ane na to te kantalyo che
nisrcitapane tamara mate parinama saru'ata karata uttama hase
tamane tamaro palanahara khuba najikamam (phala) apase ane tame khusa tha'i jaso
sum tene tamane anatha jo'i sarana na apyum
ane tamane margathi ajana jo'i margadarsana na apyum
ane tamane nirdhana jo'i dhanavana na banavi didha
basa! Tame anatha sathe kathora vyavahara na karo
ane na mangavavala ne dhutkaro
ane potana palanaharani krpanum varnana karata raho
sum ame tamari chati nathi kholi nakhi
ane tamara para thi tamaro bhara ame utari didho
jene tamari pitha todi didhi hati
ane ame tamara smaranane unnati api
basa! Ni:Sanka tangini sathe saralata che
cokkasapane tangini sathe saralata che
basa jyare tame paravari java to bandagi mam mahenata karo
ane potana palanahara tarapha ja magna tha'i java
soganda che anjira ane jetunana
ane ture sinin na (eka parvata num nama)
ane te santivala saherana
ni:Sanka ame manavinum sarvottama svarupamam sarjana karyu
pachi tene nica mam nico kari didho
Parantu je loko imana lavya ane (pachi) sadakaryo karya to temana mate evo badalo che je kadi khatma nahim thaya
basa! Tane badalana divasane juthalavava para ka'i vastu ubhare che
sum allaha ta'ala (badha) nirnayakarta'o no nirnayakarta nathi
padho potana palanaharana namathi jene sarjana karyu
jene manavinum jami gayela lohithi sarjana karyu
tame padhata raho taro palanahara atyanta udara che
jene pena maraphate (jnana) sikhavadayum
jene manavine te sikhavadayum jene te na janato hato
kharekhara manavi to vidrohi bani rahyo che
etala mate ke te potane bedarakara (khusahala) samaje che
kharekhara pacha pharavum tara palanahara tarapha che
tene pana te joyo je bandane atakave che
jyare ke te bando namajha padhe che
sum bata'o to, te satya marga tarapha hoya
athava to sanyamatano adesa apato hoya
tamaro sum khyala che, agara a juthalavato hoya ane modhum pheravato hoya to
sum tene nathi janyum ke allaha ta'ala tene jo'i rahyo che
kadapi nahim, agara a bacato na rahyo to ame tena kapalana vala pakadine khencisum
evu kapala je juththu papi che
te potana tekedarone bolavi le
ame pana (jahannamana) rakhevalane bolavi la'isum
savadhana! Teni vata kadapi na manaso. Ane sajado karo,ane nikata tha'i ja'o
ni:Sanka ame a (kura'ana) ne kadrani ratamam utaryu
tane sum khabara ke kadrani rata sum che
kadrani rata eka hajara mahina'o thi uttama che
te (ratamam dareka karya) karava mate potana palanaharana adesathi pharista'o ane ruha (jibra'ila) utare che
a ratri sampurna salamati vali hoya che ane parodhana udaya sudhi (rahe che)
Granthavala'o mam na inkari'o ane musarika loko jyam sudhi temani pase spasta dalila na avi jaya atakanara na hata (te dalila a hati ke)
allaha ta'alano eka payagambara je pavitra grantha padhe
jemam saca ane thosa adeso hoya
granthavala'o potani pase khulli dalila avi gaya pachi pana (matabheda karine) alaga-alaga tha'i gaya

temane ana sivaya bijo ko'i adesa apavamam na avyo ke phakata allahani upasana kare. Tena mate ja dina ne visudhdha rakhe. Ibrahima hanipha na dina upara ane namajhane kayama kare. Ane jhakata apata rahe. A ja che dina saca panthano
ni:Sanka je loko granthavala'o manthi inkari thaya ane musarika, sau jahannamani agamam (jase) jyam te'o hammesa rahese. A loko dustatama sarjana che
ni:Sanka je loko imana lavya ane sadakarmo karya a loko sresthatama sarjana che

temanum phala temana palanahara pase hammesa rahenari jannato che, jemani nice nahero vahi rahi che. Jemam te'o hammesahammesa rahese. Allaha ta'ala temana thi khusa thayo ane te tenathi khusa thaya. A che tena mate je potana palanahara thi dare
jyare jamina purepuri halavi nakhavamam avase
ane jamina potano boja bahara kadhi phenki dese
manavi kaheva lagase ke ane sum tha'i gayu
te divase jamina potani dareka vatonum varnana kari dese
etala mate ke tara palanahare tene adesa apyo hase
te divase loko alaga-alaga samuha banine (pacha) pharase. Jethi temane temana karma batavavamam ave
basa! Jene rajabhara bhala'i kari hase, te tene jo'i lese
ane jene rajabhara bura'i kari hase, te tene jo'i lese
hamphata dodanara ghoda'ona soganda
pachi tapa marine angara kheranara'ona soganda
pachi vaheli savare chapa maranarana soganda
Basa! Te vakhate dhulani damari'o udave che
pachi teni sathe lasakarana tolamam ghusi jaya che
kharekhara manavi potana palanahara no khuba ja apakari che
ane ni:Sandeha te svayam tena para saksi che
te malana monha mam pana sakhata che
sum tene te samaya ni khabara nathi jyare kabaro mam je (kami) che, kadhi levamam avase
ane hrdayo ni chupi vato kadhi nakhavamam avase
cokkasapane temano palanahara te divase temani avasthathi vakepha hase
khatakhatavi nakhanara
sum che te khatakhatavi nakhanara
tane sum khabara te khatakhatavi nakhanara sum che
je divase manavi vikharayela patangiyani maphaka tha'i jase
ane parvato pinjayela rangina una jeva tha'i jase
pachi jena palla bhare hase
to te'o manapasanda esa'arama mam hase
ane jena palla'o halka hase
temanum thekanum haviyaha che
tane sum khabara ke te sum che
bhadake balati aga (che)
vadhu praptini ghelacha'e tamane bedhyana kari didha
etale sudhi ke tame kabara sudhi pahonci gaya
kadapi nahim, tame najikamam jani leso
kadapi nahim, phari tame tunka samayamam jani leso
kadapi nahim, agara tame kharekhara jani lo
to ni:Sanka tame jahannama jo'i leso
ane tame tene visrvasaniya ankhathi jo'i leso
phari te divase tamarathi cokkasapane krpa vise puchatacha thase
jamanana soganda
ni:Sanka (cokkasapane) manavi kharekhara nukasanamam che
sivaya te lokona je'o imana lavya, ane sara karyo karya ane (jemane) ekabijane satyanum sucana karyu, ane ekabija ne dhairyani sikhamana kari
moto vinasa che te dareka vyakti mate je mena-tona maranara, ninda karava valo hoya
je dhana ekathum karato jaya ane ganato jaya
Te samaje che ke tenum dhana teni pase hammesa rahese
kadapi nahim, a to jarura todi phodi nakhanara agamam nakhi devamam avase
ane tane sum khabara ke a aga kevi hase
te allaha ta'ala'e bhadakaveli aga hase
je hrdayo para cadhati jase
te temana upara badhi bajuthi bandha kareli hase
mota mota stambhomam
sum tame na joyum, ke tamara palanahare hathivala'o sathe sum karyu
sum temani yuktine nisphala na kari didhi
ane temana upara paksi'ona tole-tola mokali didha
je temane mati ane pat'tharani kankari'o mari rahya hata
basa! Temane khadhela bhusa jeva kari nakhya
kuraisi'o mam sokha utpanna thavane karane
(etale ke) temane siyala ane unalana sapharathi teva'i java mate, (tena upakara mam)
basa! Temane jo'i'e ke te ja ghara na palanaharani bandagi karata rahe
jene temane bhukhamara mam khavadavyum, ane dara (bhaya) mam santi (ane nisrcintata) api
sum tame (tene pana) joyo je badalana divasane juthalave che
a ja te che je anathane dhakka mare che
ane garibane khavadavavanum protsahana nathi apato
te namajhi'o mate kheda che (ane vaila namani jahannamani jagya) che
je potani namajhathi beparavaha che
je dekhado kare che
ane saman'ya jaruriyatathi roke che
ni:Sanka ame tamane (haujha) kausara (ane ghanum badhu) apyum che
basa! Tu potana palanahara mate namajha padha ane kurabani kara
kharekhara tamaro satru ja varasadara vagarano che, ane badanama che
tame kahi do ke aya inkari'o
na hum bandagi karu chum teni, jeni tame bandagi karo cho
na tame bandagi karavana cho teni, jeni hum bandagi karu chum
ane na hum bandagi karisa, jeni tame bandagi karo cho
Ane na tame teni bandagi karavana cho, jeni hum bandagi kari rahyo chum
tamara mate tamaro dina che ane mara mate maro dina che
jyare allahani madada ane vijaya avi jaya
ane tame lokone allahana dinamam tole-tola avata jo'i lo
tame potana palanaharani â€œtasbihaâ€ (gunagana) mam lagi java, prasansa sathe ane tenathi ksamani du'a manga, ni:Sanka te khuba ja ksama kabula karavavalo che
abu lahaba na banne hatha tuti gaya ane te (pote) barabada tha'i gayo
na to tenum dhana tena mate kama avyum ane na to teni kamani
te najikamam bhadakaveli agamam jase
ane teni patni pana (jase) je lakadi'o uthavanari che
tena galamam kathinum doradum hase
tame kahi do ke te allaha ta'ala eka ja che
allaha ta'ala beniyajha che. (Evi hasti ke dareka sarjanane teni jarura che, tene ko'ini jarura nathi)
na tenathi ko'i peda thayu ane na te ko'ina thi peda thayo
ane na ko'i teni sarakhamaninum che
tame kahi do! Ke hum savarana palanaharani saranamam avum chum
dareka te vastuni bura'ithi je tene peda kari
ane andhari ratrini bura'ithi jyare tenum andharu phelaya jaya
ane gantha (lagavine te) mam phunkanarani bura'ithi (pana)
ane irsa karanara'o ni bura'ithi jyare te irsa kare
tame kahi do! Ke hum lokona palanaharani saranamam avum chum
lokona malikana (ane)
lokona ma'abudana (saranamam)
sanka'o nakhanara, pacha hati janarani bura'ithi
je lokona hrdayomam sanka'o nakhe che
(pachi) te jinnatomam thi hoya athava to manusyomam thi
